quest.name: Out on One's Own
journal:
î‚¾ Quest Sync
The stern sentinel stares off into the distance despondently.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: Yes? Oh, my apologies for not noticing your arrival. I await my sister's return.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: She has been training to become a hunter, and today I sent her off into the woods alone for the first time. I wanted to believe she was ready... Yet I fear I have made a terrible mistake.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: Even now I can hear her cries echo through the woods, but it is forbidden to assist hunters in their training.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: You, however, are not bound by our laws. In fact, my sisters would likely see it as a mercy if you did.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: It shames me to ask this of you, but could you bring her back to Fanow? She was last seen near Bowrest.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: Please bring her home. She is not yet ready to hunt alone.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The terrified trainee runs off to the east. Best chase after her before she comes to harm.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: ...What? <gasp> You! Forgive me. In my panic I mistook you for one of the tarichuks.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: More importantly, why are you here?

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: I see... <sigh> Sister will be disappointed to hear of this.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: Would you accompany me? Perhaps she will be more forgiving in your presence.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: I hope she will not be too angry with me.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: Words fail to express the joy I feel to see her safe. Thank you.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: I have failed you, Sister. If not for herhim, beasts of the wood would have surely devoured me.

dialogue.name: OLDERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: You were not ready to hunt alone, and there is no shame in that. The failure lies with me. My poor judgment put you in danger. But you will be ready next time. I will see to it personally.

dialogue.name: YOUNGERSISTERVIIS03469
dialogue.text: And thank you, as well. When next we meet, perhaps I will be saving you.
